entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Be Focused Pro- Pomodoro Timer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99

Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Pile of capsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Special packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Small packÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Great packÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Useful packÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Standart packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Case with capsÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Survival kitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫4.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫109,99
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫459,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Presets
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Recruit legendary heroes and conquer endless stages! From auto battles to mining and upgrading! A true idle fantasy RPG that keeps growing even when you're away! * Build strategic teams with unique and powerful heroes! * Mine resources through the mining system! Get everything you need to craft gear! * Challenge powerful bosses and claim legendary rewards! * Progress automatically ‚Äî perfect for busy players! * Tons of content: dungeons, relics, evolution, legendary equipment, and more! Download now and begin writing your own legend! Start playing now and collect your heroes!

entry.title: Vostok ‚Äî Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok ‚Äì your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: ¬∑ 200+ design templates for social media ¬∑ Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support ¬∑ 450+ unique stickers ¬∑ Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos ¬∑ Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors ¬∑ Ad-free with no subscription requirements ¬∑ Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

entry.title: Whisper Notes - Speech To Text
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Whisper Notes: Offline speech-to-text powered by Whisper AI, perfect for capturing daily voice memos and meeting notes. The app runs completely offline to ensure your voice recordings and privacy never leave your device. No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no ads‚Äîjust a simple one-time payment for lifetime access. ‚ñ† Features - Local voice recording & transcription - Import and transcribe audio/video files, all offline - Batch export or delete text and audio files - Supports export of timestamped transcript ‚ñ† Why we made this Sometimes I have a bizarre dream and want to record it when I wake up, but typing with sleepy eyes is tough. I needed a tool that could quickly capture and transcribe speech. When friends send messages that need long replies while I'm out walking or eating, I want to respond quickly without sending voice messages. ‚ñ† FAQ 1. Does it support real-time transcription during recording? Not currently‚Äîit records first, then transcribes when you're finished recording. 2. Is there a maximum transcription length? No limit in theory‚Äîyou can record several hours of audio. However, since transcription happens on your device, longer recordings will take more time to process. I've tested it with about 1 hour of audio and the transcription was accurate. 3. What's the transcription speed? It depends on your device. On my iPhone 15, the transcription speed is about 1:5, meaning 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute to transcribe. 4. Why is this a paid app without a free trial? We designed Whisper Notes to be completely offline to protect your privacy. Once you download and open the app, it never connects to the internet again. Offering a free trial would require in-app purchases, which need an internet connection‚Äîexactly what we're trying to avoid to keep your data secure. If you're not satisfied, just tap the settings button in the top right corner to find the "Request Refund" option. 5. Why doesn't it support AI summaries? Privacy is our top priority. We never upload your voice recordings or transcriptions to any AI services or cloud servers. You can always copy your transcriptions and use your preferred AI tool separately if you want summaries. 6. Why does transcription stop when I switch to another app? Because Whisper Notes uses on-device processing, it needs access to your phone's GPU to transcribe audio. Apple doesn't allow third-party apps to use the GPU when running in the background, so iOS automatically stops the transcription process when you leave the app. If this happens, simply return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe" to pick up where you left off. 7. What languages are supported? English, ‰∏≠Êñá, Deutsch, Espa√±ol, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥, Fran√ßais, Êó•Êú¨Ë™û, Portugu√™s, T√ºrk√ße, Polski, Catal√†, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát, Hebrew, –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, ƒåe≈°tina, Rom√¢nƒÉ, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvi≈≥, Latina, MƒÅori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenƒçina, Telugu, Persian, Latvie≈°u, Bengali, –°—Ä–ø—Å–∫–∏, Az…ôrbaycan, Sloven≈°ƒçina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, √çslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yor√πb√°, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, F√∏royskt, Krey√≤l Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese ‚ñ† Contact support@whispernotes.app https://whispernotes.app

Application Description

Turn Your Apple Watch into a Sound Effect Generator! With this fun and exciting Apple Watch app, you can choose your favorite sound effects and activate them with just a flick of your wrist! Immerse yourself in the world of superheroes‚Äîtransform like Iron Man or Spider-Man, or explore a variety of other thrilling sounds. Download now and unleash the power of sound‚Äîbring your childhood dreams to life!

Application Description

Build traps facilities in your dungeon, hire monsters, discover relics with mysterious power, and protect your dungeon from heroes that came to take you down. ‚óÜ CONTENTS - 9 Dark Lords with special skills! - 300+ monsters and heroes - 100+ traps and facilities for your dungeon - 200+ relics with mysterious power - Various EVENTS filled with surprises - Various elements that can be unlocked throughout gameplay - and more‚Ä¶! Strong strategy will help you survive the swarm of heroes and allow you to unlock more elements for your dungeon. May your dungeon endure the bravest heroes there are! ‚óÜ EXPLORE YOUR FATE Choose your fate from a selection of fate cards every day. If you wish to battle, heroes will come, and if you wish for surprises, a special event will take place. Choose the fate you want as the master of your dungeon. -SUPPORT- E-Mail : support@gamecoaster.com Tel :+82 10-4178-0283
